title: The Sunday Missal: New Standard Blue Edition
description: The Sunday Missal is an essential resource for preparing for Roman Catholic Sunday Mass and taking an active part in its celebration. This is the official Missal for England, Ireland, Scotland, and Wales and is intended for English-speaking churches across Europe, Africa, and Asia. Recently updated, it features the latest additions to the calendar of saints days and includes lists of moveable dates such as Easter and Pentecost up to 2040.
author: Anonymous
